org.numenta.nupic.encoders

Class PassThroughEncoder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.encoders.Encoder<T>
      • org.numenta.nupic.encoders.PassThroughEncoder<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Persistable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SDRPassThroughEncoder, SparsePassThroughEncoder

    public class PassThroughEncoder<T>
extends Encoder<T>
    Pass an encoded SDR straight to the model. Each encoding is an SDR in which w out of n bits are turned on.
    Author:
    wilsondy (from Python original)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PassThroughEncoder.Builder
      Returns a Encoder.Builder for constructing PassThroughEncoders

      The base class architecture is put together in such a way where boilerplate initialization can be kept to a minimum for implementing subclasses, while avoiding the mistake-proneness of extremely long argument lists.

      • getBucketValues

        public <T> java.util.List<T> getBucketValues(java.lang.Class<T> returnType)
        Description copied from class: Encoder
        Returns a list of items, one for each bucket defined by this encoder. Each item is the value assigned to that bucket, this is the same as the EncoderResult.value that would be returned by getBucketInfo() for that bucket and is in the same format as the input that would be passed to encode(). This call is faster than calling getBucketInfo() on each bucket individually if all you need are the bucket values.
        Specified by:
        getBucketValues in class Encoder<T>
        Parameters:
        returnType - class type parameter so that this method can return encoder specific value types
        Returns:
        list of items, each item representing the bucket value for that bucket.
